definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: You make even the smallest incident seem so interesting.
sentences.chinese: 你的妙筆使藐小的工作都顯得很有趣。

sentences.english: Human indeed hard to attain clever pen.
sentences.chinese: 人類丹青妙筆難以企及。

sentences.english: He had a surprisingly delicate touch.
sentences.chinese: 他生花的妙筆令人驚訝。

sentences.english: You make even the smallest incident seems so interesting.
sentences.chinese: 您的妙筆使細小的事情都顯得很有趣。
人類丹青妙筆難以企及。

sentences.english: Many literary gems flew from his deft pen.
sentences.chinese: 許多文學珍品出自他的生花妙筆。
